item.title: How to upload pics?
item.dc:creator: @zxr3d_h0txz zxr3d h0txz
item.description:
@zxr3d_h0txz wrote:

go to photobucket.com…make an account then go to my album and then upload a pic then it will make the code then go to ur pick then copy the image code or img code that it gives u then paste it on ur topic that u make here…or even easier go to imageshake.uk or sumthin like that…gl
